utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: How may I help you?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Hi yes I'm just coming in, uh over the last week, I've been having um like a cough, runny nose and a lot of congestion as well. So I just wanted to come in here to make sure nothing's wrong.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, alright, and when did the uh cough start? Was it 7 days ago?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: A bit less than that, I would say it's been probably like five or six days.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and has the cough been getting any better or any worse or staying the same?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um it's kind of the same.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and are you bringing up any uh sputum with the cough?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, it's mainly like a dry cough, but I am getting like a lot of drainage and uh just congestion in my nose.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, so you're, you are, are you feeling um like mucus drain from your nose like into the back of your uh mouth?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, sometimes I feel like that over the last week.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. And you you haven't caught up any any sputum, but have you brought up any any blood?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, no blood.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, have you had any wheezing?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no wheezing.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and how about um any chest pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no chest pain.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and you've had a, and did you, have you had a cough before or is this a new cough?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no, this is like fairly new.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. And um could you, is your nose uh like, could you describe the discharge from your nose?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, it's more like kind of a clear to maybe whitish discharge.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And these symptoms start about a week ago as well or about five days ago?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um yeah, around the same time.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK. And have you had any uh like facial pain like over your over your cheeks or or forehead?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and have you felt like your nose um is obstructed, like you're not able to breathe in through either one of your nostrils?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, that happens and sometimes the nostrils keep switching.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and have you had a loss or a change in your sense of smell?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um just when I'm congested like I feel like I can't really smell.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, alright. Have you had a loss or a change in your sense of taste?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and have you had any shortness of breath with the cough?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and have you had any eye redness or um eye discharge?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I don't think so.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, and how about a sore throat?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm, maybe a little bit of a tickle in my throat, but not sore.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK, so have you had any pain with swallowing food or liquids?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um have you had any headaches?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any fevers or chills?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any uh night sweats?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And how was your weight been recently? Any changes?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no changes.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and have you had any nausea or vomiting?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Have you had any diarrhea?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, no diarrhea.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and have you had any urinary problems like painful urination or or frequency?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Nope.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and then any skin changes or or rashes?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh nope, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, any muscle aches or body pains?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, and how has your energy been over this past week? Have you had fatigue?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, I've been, I haven't been tired or like, it's just been like these symptoms that don't seem to go away.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK. Um and uh, have you had any changes to your um to your voice?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Or any any neck swelling?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, um so it sounds like over the past uh week you've been having this dry cough uh as well as some nasal discharge and some congestion with um a little bit of a scratchy throat. Um any other symptoms?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, that's pretty much it.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, alright, and in the past have you been diagnosed with any medical conditions?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, I've been pretty healthy.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, that's good. And, uh, any uh prior hospitalizations or surgeries?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright. And do you take any medications regularly, prescribed or over the counter?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um I've just been taking like Tylenol cold, but it's not really been helping too much.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um do you have any allergies?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uhm and, uh currently are you, could you just tell me a little bit about your living situation, um like who you're living with and uh and whereabouts?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um yeah, so I just live in an apartment with my boyfriend and uh live like just within the city.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and are you going to school right now or are you working?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, I'm working uh currently um just at a grocery store.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and have you been around anybody who's been sick?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh not that I know of, yeah, I haven't seen anyone like have symptoms or anything.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, have you traveled anywhere?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I've been in the province.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and you mentioned um that you have a boyfriend. Are you currently uh sexually active?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yep.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And do you use condoms or any form of birth control?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, usually like just condoms.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK, and is there any chance that uh you could be pregnant currently?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no, I don't think so.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uh, and I just want um, are you currently smoking?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, I have haven't, haven't smoked ever.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and that includes cigarettes and marijuana?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh Yeah, no no marijuana either.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, do you drink alcohol?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh just like once or twice in a week.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And is it like one or two drinks?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, so I would say, like it would usually be wine.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see alright, and do you use any other uh recreational drugs?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, nothing else.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and in the family, um are there any history of heart or lung problems?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um not that I know of, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, and how about any uh any cancers?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, um so uhm that was everything I wanted to ask today on on history, was there anything else that maybe I forgot to ask about, you wanted to mention?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, I just yeah, I was just wondering if like I should be worried at all about Covid.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Yeah, certainly um something that we'll be testing for today with some of the symptoms that you're having like um cough and some nonspecific symptoms like that can show up in Covid, um for sure so it will be important to get a test for that today, which will require a nasal swab. Um that being said, it could be uhm another type of viral illness like the common cold, which is causing your your symptoms here today, um and so it will be just be important to be diligent and if your symptoms, diligent with the testing I mean, with the Covid, and if your symptoms get any worse we, it might be important to go to the hospital or or the emergency department.

utterances.speaker: control
utterances.text: Add differential diagnosis
